supermind.getPaid: Get paid to reply to your fans.
supermind.fansCant: Fans can’t send you Supermind offers for less than your minimum offer amount.
supermind.addBankDetail: Start receiving cash payouts by adding your bank details.
supermind.7daysToReply: The recipient will have up to 7 days to reply. You may cancel the offer at anytime

producer.title: Get paid to reply to your fans.

1.title: How to earn
1.subtitle: Fans send offers of cash and tokens, which you earn by simply replying. Minds collects just a 15% platform fee (vs. 30% fees on other platforms), and our payment processor charges a small fee per transaction.
1.subtitle-iOS: Fans send offers, which you earn by simply replying. Minds collects just a 10% platform fee (vs. 30% fees on other platforms), and our payment processor charges a small fee per transaction. See terms & conditions.

2.title: It's your content
2.subtitle: Your replies are public for all of your followers, so everyone benefits from the interaction.

3.title: Limitations
3.subtitle: Once you accept an offer, your reply can't be deleted. And NSFW content is currently not supported with Supermind.

consumer.title: Get replies from your favorite creators by sending them paid offers.
consumer.title-iOS: Get replies from your favorite creators by sending them token offers.

1.title: Set an offer amount
1.subtitle: Send an offer of cash or tokens. The creator earns the offer amount when they reply.
1.subtitle-iOS: Send an offer of tokens. The creator earns the offer amount when they reply.

2.title: Prompt with a public post
2.subtitle: You'll make a new public post that the target creator can reply to.

3.title: Get a reply
3.subtitle: Creators have 7 days to reply to your post. You will not be charged if they do not reply.

confirm.title: Confirm reply
confirm.description: Are you sure you want to post this reply? Once posted your reply cannot be deleted.

twitter.title: Post to my Twitter
twitter.description: This Supermind offer requires posting the reply to Twitter.

confirmNoRefund.title: Confirm Offer
confirmNoRefund.offerDescription: I understand this transaction is non-refundable once the recipient approves my offer.
confirmNoRefund.description: I understand this transaction is non-refundable.

liveReplyRequest.title: Live reply
liveReplyRequest.description: This Supermind is requesting a live reply. The recipient will respond on a live stream, podcast, or other media platform, which means you won't get a {{TENANT}} activity post reply when they accept the offer.

liveReplyConfirm.title: Live reply
liveReplyConfirm.description: This Supermind is requesting a live reply. You won't need to create a post to accept this offer, just respond on your live stream, podcast, or other preferred medium.

twitterConnect.connectSuccess: You channel is now connected to your Twitter account
twitterConnect.connectFailed: Something went wrong while connecting to Twitter
twitterConnect.connectConfigFailed: An unexpected error has occurred getting your twitter configuration

twitterPermission.title: Twitter Permission
twitterPermission.description: To accept this Supermind offer, please connect your Twitter account. This will give Minds permission to repost your response on your behalf, but only when you consent.

auth.2faEmailDescription: {{TENANT}} just sent a 6-digit authentication code to your registered email address
auth.2faSmsDescription: To continue, please confirm the two-factor verification code sent to your phone before continuing.
auth.2faAppDescription: To continue, insert a six-digit authentication code using your authenticator app.

auth.termsAcceptedError: You should accept the terms and conditions

auth.waitMoment: You have to wait 10 seconds after last time you've requested the email

auth.newPassword: Create a new password. You’ll use this to access your account.
auth.mistypedEmail: Mistyped your email? Change your email address below.

inFeedNotices.boostChannelDescription: Use Boost to reach new audiences on {{TENANT}}. Boosted channels get more engagement and subscribers.
inFeedNotices.boostPartnerTitle: Welcome to the Boost Partners Program
inFeedNotices.boostPartnerDescription: You are now eligible to earn a 50/50 revenue-share for serving Boosts on your channel and content pages. You may disable or change your settings any time.
inFeedNotices.pendingSupermindDescription: Reply to your fans to claim cash or tokens before your pending offers expire.
inFeedNotices.verifyEmailDescription: Before getting down to business on {{TENANT}}, can we please ask that you verify your email address. (P.S. Check your spam folder 📥)
inFeedNotices.tagsDescription: Updating your interest tags improves your experience on {{TENANT}}, and makes it easier to discover creators and content you haven't found yet.
inFeedNotices.userDescription: Let the {{TENANT}} community know who you are by decking out your channel page. This step is required to join the token rewards program.
inFeedNotices.uniquenessDescription: Verify your uniqueness to get started earning token rewards for engagement on your content.
inFeedNotices.inviteFriendsDescription: {{TENANT}} gets better with friends. Share your referral link to invite them to join. If they earn money on {{TENANT}}, you'll earn a 5% referral fee.

plusUpgrade.title: Upgrade to Minds+
plusUpgrade.description: Get verified, hide ads, and get the most of your Minds experience

rssScreen.description: Sync an RSS feed to your channel and automatically post links from the RSS feed to your social media channel. This is a great way to share new articles, blogs, or videos from an RSS feed with your audience, automatically.
rssScreen.activeDescription: The feed should sync around every 5 minutes. If you want to manually check for new updates, simply hit refresh

settings.deleteChannelConfirm: Your account and all data related to it will be deleted permanently. Are you sure you want to proceed?
settings.disableDescription: Deactivating your account will make your profile invisible. You will also not receive emails or notifications. Your username will be reserved in case you return to {{TENANT}}.
settings.deleteDescription: Warning: This is not reversible and will result in permanent loss of your channel and all of your data. Your channel will not be recoverable.
settings.errorSaving: Error saving setting, please try again
settings.TFAdescription: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account. In addition to your username and password, you’ll need to enter a code that {{TENANT}} sends to you via text or an app on your phone.
settings.TFADisableDesc: Are you sure you wish to disable two-factor authentication on your {{TENANT}} account?
settings.TFAEnterCode: Enter the six-digit code from the application
settings.TFARecoveryCodesDesc: Recovery codes are used to access your account in the event you cannot receive two-factor authentication codes.
settings.TFARecoveryCodesBeSure: Please make sure to store this information securely. If you lose it we can not guarantee that you will regain access to your account
settings.TFAVerifyDesc: Enter the following two-factor secret into your authenticator app
settings.TFARecoveryCodeUsedDesc: 2FA has been disabled on your {{TENANT}} account because you used your one-time TOTP recovery code.
settings.TFARecoveryCodeUsedContact: If you did not enter your recovery code or believe you have received this message in error, please contact us immediately at

twitterSync.title: Twitter
twitterSync.description: Using our Twitter Sync tool, Twitter users with over {{limit}} followers can have their new tweets automatically copied over from Twitter to Minds. Retweets, replies, and tweet deletions are not synced to Minds. You can edit and/or delete posts on Minds through the Minds app or website.
twitterSync.discoverable: Allow other channels to discover me via Twitter

step1.title: Step 1
step1.desc: We need you to create a Tweet so that we can pair your account. It's important that the pre-populated link is not changed.

tooltips.todayEstimate: Your estimated token payout for today's contribution.
tooltips.prevDateEarnings: Your token payout for this date.
tooltips.nextPayout: Countdown until your next token payout is issued.
tooltips.engagement: Summary of your token rewards for engagement on your content.
tooltips.holding: Summary of your token rewards for holding tokens on-chain.
tooltips.liquidity: Summary of your token rewards for providing liquidity.
tooltips.engagementScore: Your score for referrals and engagement on your content and channel.
tooltips.engagementTotal: Total network score for all referrals and engagement on the app.
tooltips.engagementPercentage: Your score divided by the total network score.
tooltips.engagementReward: Your estimated token reward based on your percent share.
tooltips.engagementActivity: Your account's activity level to determine your multiplier.
tooltips.holdingScore: Your score for holding your tokens on-chain.
tooltips.holdingTotal: Total network score for holding tokens on-chain.
tooltips.holdingPercentage: Your score divided by the total network score.
tooltips.holdingReward: Your estimated token reward based on your percent share.
tooltips.holdingDuration: The number of consecutive days you have held tokens on-chain
tooltips.holdingMultiplier: Your score multiplier as determined by duration.
tooltips.liquidityTotal: Total network score for providing liquidity.
tooltips.liquidityPercentage: Your score divided by the total network score.
tooltips.liquidityReward: Your estimated token reward based on your percent share.
tooltips.liquidityDuration: The number of consecutive days you have provided liquidity.
tooltips.liquidityMultiplier: Your score multiplier as determined by duration.

footers.holding: Daily metrics are updated every day at 12:00 AM UTC

tokens.completeToTransfer: Please complete the following before transferring MINDS tokens on-chain.
tokens.transferRequest: You can request to transfer up to 25,000 tokens from your rewards to your on-chain wallet. You can only have one pending withdrawal at a time.
tokens.transferNote: Note: a small amount of ETH will be charged to cover the transaction fee.

tooltips.LiquidityFees: Total fees earned by liquidity providers in the past 24 hours
tooltips.LiquidityTradedVolume: Total volume traded on Uniswap in the past 24 hours
tooltips.EngagementScore: The total number of points generated by the community for receiving engagement on their posts in the past 24 hours
tooltips.HoldingScore: The total number of points generated by the community for holding tokens on-chain in the past 24 hours
tooltips.LiquidityScore: The total number of points generated by the community for providing liquidity in the past 24 hours
tooltips.EmissionBreakDown: A summary of how many tokens are rewarded each day and how they are allocated
tooltips.CirculatingSupply: The number of tokens circulating in the community
tooltips.MarketCap: The circulating supply multiplied by the current market price of the token
tooltips.TokenHolders: The total number of users who have ever held a token
tooltips.TokensReclaimed: The total number of tokens reclaimed by {{TENANT}} for providing services
tooltips.TokensRewarded: The total number of tokens rewarded to the community
tooltips.TotalSupply: The total number of tokens that can ever exist
tooltips.TransactionsCount: The total number of token transactions in the past 24 hours
tooltips.TransactionsUnique: The total number of unique users who have performed a token transaction in the past 24 hours
tooltips.TransactionsVolume: The total volume of tokens exchanged in the past 24 hours

monetize.title: Monetize
monetize.plusDescription: Support Minds and unlock features such as earning revenue for your content, hiding ads, accessing exclusive content, receiving a badge and verifying your channel.
monetize.proTitle: A new revenue model for creators
monetize.proDescription: Get paid for your traffic and referrals, launch your own website, receive multi-currency tips and subscription payments from fans and much more.
monetize.subScreensTitle: Last month Pro creators earned over $2,500!

plusMonetize.notPlus: You’ll need to upgrade to Minds+ in order to submit your post to the Minds+ content pool. You will earn revenue based on the performance of the content.

referrals.description: If your friend signs up for {{TENANT}} within 24 hours of clicking the link you shared with them, they’ll be added to your pending referrals. Once they sign up for the rewards program by setting up their {{TENANT}} wallet, the referral is complete and you’ll both get +10 added to your contribution scores!
